parameters:
Welcome. If you have any requests, please take a look at the
menu.
...Eyepatches are for fashion purposes, so please understand.
Atem who moved to the capital

Yurisine, as expected of the city. The food here is so
delicious...

...I'm not drinking alone, you know? I wonder if my partner is
somewhere throwing up.

I'm the escort for these two. They want to get married here.
Sigh, I guess I need to find a partner too...
Menanna who moved to the capital

I was worried when I left the countryside... but somehow, it
seems like I'll be able to manage.
As expected, it's alcohol... This is the reason I live.

Not only the alcohol, but the food is also delicious here...
sigh... I'm going to gain weight...

I... feel like I've never been able to grow up... or rather, I've
been chasing after the Tears of a Mermaid that I saw when I was a
child... That's the kind of life I have.
Do you... have something like that too...?

Haha...! I see. It's a little comforting to know that you
understand...

You... seem to be looking straight ahead without wavering. Or...
perhaps you'll be bound by something new from now on.

*sigh*... I just experienced a heartbreak... I was neglected
because of work...

If you were told to choose between work and family, what would
you do?!
Yes, I... I didn't want to regret it... But...

So, spend the rest of my life regretting it? If I'm not alone,
maybe that would be happiness...?

If only I were a genius who could choose both... But... Sadly,
I'm just an ordinary person... *sigh*...

Sigh... It's just like this... It's troublesome, isn't it... This
thing called life...
The sound of your knock... It's really good... Please... more...
I will do it for you
Ah, ah...  It's echoing deep inside...
I-I can't take it anymore...  I-I can't... !
Shall I knock for you some more?!
I will do it for you
